channel.title: How to host?
channel.description:
Hello, I was just wondering on how to host a server on the Server Status Page. I have to Port Forward my port through uTorrent. There is a guid on moparisthebest.com on how to do it. So i run that. I have my runserver up. I can connect locally to my server but when i try to host it it says it is offline and will not let me continue. Yes i have a no-ip but i do not think they are linked together. I really need some step by step instructions on what to do. Is there some line of code in my server i have to change to my no-ip.org adress? or what?
Thanks guys! =)

item.title: How to host?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

He is blushing. uTorrent Says 43594 is not forwarded correctly. But if i cannot forward ports how am i soposed to open this? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 08:24:59 pm[/size][hr]Please? Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: How to host?
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Check your No-IP DUC and make sure the smiley face is blushing and the box next to it is checked. If he still cannot connect, check your setting on uTorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: How to host?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

It on the MSSP it says your server is offline and must be online to be registerd. It wont let me submit it. When my bro tried to conect to the x-temple.no-ip.org adress it says cannot connect to server

Sorry for double post figured a new topic would orginze things better…Sorry dude!

Read full topic

item.title: How to host?
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Please don’t double post. Ask one of your friends to try to log on to your server, and if they can, your server is online, but the MSSP will say it is offline. Don’t worry about the MSSP.
If your friend cannot log on, check you No-IP DUC, and make sure the box next to the IP name is checked, and the smiley face is blushing. If they still cannot connect, check your settings on uTorrent.

Read full topic
